mapper.select: select b_category, b_subject, b_content , b_regdate , b_num from board where b_category = #{b_category} and bl_num = #{bl_num} order by b_regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into board values( board_seq.nextval, #{bl_num}, #{b_subject}, #{b_content}, #{b_category}, #{b_filename}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update board set b_subject = #{b_subject}, b_content = #{b_content}, b_category = #{b_category}, b_filename = #{b_filename}, b_regdate = sysdate where b_num = #{b_num}
